name: Speed thread's UP !
description:
Speed thread's UP ! is a 2D Hyper Casual game where you have to shoot lines on the platform to collect the coins.

In this game, you have to move, pull threads and swing with your threads. With these skills you have to be faster than time. Each part is unique, a random generation of map is added to the gameplay.

You have 1 minute to collect the most coins, how many are you going to get ?

This game playable with the mouse and the keyboard.

CONTROLS :

⭐ - HOLD LEFT CLICK to shoot threads. 

⭐ - The sphere sticks to the surface. 

⭐ -  LEFT and RIGHT ARROW  to move. 

TOOLS USED :

🔧 - Unity (2020.3.15f2 Version)

🔧 - Krita

🔧 - Audacity

DEVELOPER :

Martin JOUBERT itch.io - Instagram - Twitter - YouTube

This game  was made for One Minute Game jams #1.
